items.label: Project snapshot
items.prompt: Give a concise snapshot of project {{PROJECT}}: open issues, blockers, critical issues, and last updates.

items.label: Updated last 24h
items.prompt: List issues in project {{PROJECT}} updated in the last 24 hours. Return idReadable, summary, state, assignee.

items.label: Resolved last 7d
items.prompt: List issues resolved in project {{PROJECT}} in the last 7 days. Return idReadable, summary, resolution date.

items.label: State counts
items.prompt: Group open issues in project {{PROJECT}} by State and provide counts.

items.label: Workload per assignee
items.prompt: Group open issues in project {{PROJECT}} by assignee and show counts.

items.label: Unassigned
items.prompt: Find unassigned open issues in project {{PROJECT}}. Return idReadable, summary, priority.

items.label: Open > 30 days
items.prompt: Find issues in project {{PROJECT}} open for more than 30 days. Sort by age descending.

items.label: Stuck In Progress > 14d
items.prompt: Find issues in project {{PROJECT}} stuck in 'In Progress' for more than 14 days.

items.label: Not updated > 21d
items.prompt: Find open issues in project {{PROJECT}} not updated in the last 21 days.

items.label: Critical / Blockers
items.prompt: List Critical or Blocker issues in project {{PROJECT}}. Include idReadable, summary, state, assignee.

items.label: Risk summary
items.prompt: Based on current open issues in project {{PROJECT}}, summarize the main technical and delivery risks.

items.label: SLA risk (heuristic)
items.prompt: Identify issues in project {{PROJECT}} likely to miss SLA based on age, priority and state.

items.label: State distribution
items.prompt: Show how many issues in project {{PROJECT}} are in each workflow state.

items.label: Workflow regressions
items.prompt: Find issues in project {{PROJECT}} that moved backwards in workflow (e.g. Review -> In Progress).

items.label: Bottlenecks
items.prompt: Analyze workflow states in project {{PROJECT}} and identify bottlenecks.

items.label: Created per week
items.prompt: How many issues were created per week in project {{PROJECT}} in the last 2 months?

items.label: Resolved per week
items.prompt: How many issues were resolved per week in project {{PROJECT}} in the last month?

items.label: Lead time estimate
items.prompt: Estimate average time from creation to resolution for issues in project {{PROJECT}}.

items.label: Next sprint candidates
items.prompt: Suggest a prioritized list of issues for the next sprint in project {{PROJECT}}. Explain the reasoning.

items.label: Carry-over risks
items.prompt: Which issues in project {{PROJECT}} are most likely to spill into the next sprint?

items.label: Meeting report
items.prompt: Generate a short status report for a project meeting about {{PROJECT}}: progress, blockers, risks, next actions.
